name: Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit
description: The Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit 2 continues to help keep you running. A refreshed upper uses Flywire technology that combines with Flyknit for support and breathability where you need it. The high foam heights provide soft responsiveness and long-lasting comfort, plus a wider forefoot for added stability. It's still one of our most tested shoes, designed to help you feel the potential when your foot hits the pavement.

name: Nike React Miler
description: The Nike React Miler gives you trusted stability for miles with athlete-informed performance. Made for dependability on your long runs, its intuitive design offers a locked-in fit and a durable feel.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 37
description: Take your training runs to the next level with the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 37. With unbelievable React cushioning and a new forefoot Air unit, they’re like a bolt of caffeine for your legs. The lightweight upper breathes incredibly well. Pared-down, perfectly placed padding helps reduce hotspots. And the super grippy outsole? Well, let’s just say you gotta stay upright to run. Here’s to letting mud fly and streets vanish behind you.

name: Nike Joyride Run Flyknit
description: They’re soft, they’re bouncy, and they form the core of an innovative new cushioning system designed to help make all the ways you move feel easy—even running.

name: Nike Mercurial Vapor 13 Elite FG
description: Building on the 360-degree Flyknit innovation of the 12, the Nike Mercurial Vapor 13 Elite FG adds a Nike Aerotrak zone to the forefoot and a slightly stiffer chassis to help supercharge traction. Inside, an insole with NikeGrip technology provides maximum interior traction underfoot and lightweight cushioning.

name: Nike Phantom Vision Elite Dynamic Fit FG
description: The Nike Phantom Vision 2 Elite Dynamic Fit FG brings a new level of fierce precision to the field. A foot-hugging inner sleeve is concealed in a textured Flyknit outer layer to create a cleat for the finishers, the providers and the battlers of tomorrow's game. Conforming Comfort : Quad-Fit mesh hugs your foot without being constricting for dynamic support cut after cut. Precise Touch : Targeted texture across the upper provides precise touch and control on the ball. Breathable Support : Flyknit construction creates flexible, breathable support. Hidden Laces : Ghost Lace system tightens with one pull and stays hidden for a clean striking surface and precision on the ball. Streamlined Fit : Dynamic Fit collar wraps your ankle in soft, stretchy knit for a comfortable, secure fit.

name: Nike Phantom Venom Academy FG
description: The Nike Phantom Venom Academy FG Fit FG brings a new level of fierce precision to the field. A foot-hugging inner sleeve is concealed in a textured Flyknit outer layer to create a cleat for the finishers, the providers and the battlers of tomorrow's game. Conforming Comfort : Quad-Fit mesh hugs your foot without being constricting for dynamic support cut after cut. Precise Touch : Targeted texture across the upper provides precise touch and control on the ball. Breathable Support : Flyknit construction creates flexible, breathable support. Hidden Laces : Ghost Lace system tightens with one pull and stays hidden for a clean striking surface and precision on the ball.

name: Nike Mercurial Vapor 13 Elite Tech Craft FG
description: The fit of the Nike Mercurial Vapor 13 Elite shoe is outstanding, report several review sites. The All Conditions Control technology integrated into the shoe upper ensures ball touch and control even in wet weather conditions. The shoe’s central lace closure remarkably secures the fit.The Nike Mercurial Vapor 13 Elite still brought the shoe to another level. These shoes are made for players looking for exceptional fit, touch, and traction in the soccer field.

name: Nike Renew Run
description: Elevate your kick game with this fresh catch that's inspired by your next vacation. Airy, summertime accents like the mesh Swoosh let you show off your socks. Made from at least 20% recycled materials by weight, it lets you do good by looking good.

name: Austin
description: Elevate your kick game with this fresh catch that's inspired by your next vacation. Airy, summertime accents like the mesh Swoosh let you show off your socks. Made from at least 50% recycled materials by weight, it lets you do good by looking good.

name: SS-HL-0135
description: Elevate your kick game with this fresh catch that's inspired by your next vacation. Airy, summertime accents like the mesh Swoosh let you show off your socks. Made from at least 80% recycled materials by weight, it lets you do good by looking good.

description: Upper Material Synthetic : Sole Material Sheet Sole

name: SS-HL-0128
description: Lower Material Synthetic : Sole Material Sheet Sole

name: SS-MS-0075
description: Gommino Mokassin von Tod's aus geschmeidigem Veloursleder mit Kettenglied-förmigem Metallaccessoire mit Logo, handgefertigten, sichtbaren Steppnähten und ikonischer Noppensohle.

name: SS-MS-0075
description: Veloursleder mit Kettenglied-förmigem Metallaccessoire.

name: SS-PM-0093
description: SS-PM-0093 Women Shoe Veloursleder mit Kettenglied-förmigem Metallaccessoire

name: Nizza X Disney
description: B-ball players debuted the adidas Nizza sneaker. Skaters co-opted it. Now fans of Disney's Bambi get their own hot take. These shoes are not only adorable — just look at the flowers on the canvas upper — they're also revolutionary. A tribute to Disney's first credited female illustrator, they stand tall on a bold platform outsole.Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: X_PLR
description: These juniors' shoes combine innovative running-inspired looks and supreme comfort. With a breathable mesh upper and textile lining, they feature an EVA midsole that provides lightweight cushioning. Matching 3-Stripes and heel patch keep this pair authentically adidas.

name: Stan Smith
description: STAN SMITH, FOREVER. ALWAYS ICONIC. NOW MORE SUSTAINABLE.

name: NMD_R1
description: Inspired by running silhouettes from the '80s archive, NMD was born in 2015 to merge sleek style with modern technologies and comfort. This pair of the iconic shoes brings easy energy to your everyday look. Energy-returning BOOST in the midsole provides comfort, and the signature NMD midsole plugs and heel pull ratchet up the futuristic look.

name: NMD_R1 Flash Red
description: These adidas NMD_R1 Red shoes celebrate South Park's seemingly immortal Kenny. The bold orange mimics his iconic parka, with the furry interior popping out just like the lining of his hood.

name: Superstar
description: Rise to the challenge. Whether that means a packed day of school and practice or gathering up the guts to talk to that someone special, there's no hurdle too big to tackle in these juniors' adidas NMD_R1 Shoes. They're built on adidas' running legacy and infused with the best technology of today — like Boost cushioning — so every step is soft, stylish and full of energy. And they have the signature midsole plugs, a symbol of the fearless NMD spirit.

name: Club C Revenge Mens
description: Turn up the volume on your OG collegiate look. A fresh take on vintage gives these men's Reebok Club C Revenge Shoes a standout look. Retro colorways keep your style legit, and premium details like a supple full grain leather upper and a soft terry lining add a luxe vibe. Color pops hit just right.

name: SK80-Low
description: The Vintage Sport Sk8-Low, a takedown of the legendary Vans high top, is built with durable leather uppers in bold retro colorways. Bringing a familiar Sk8-Hi aesthetic to a classic low top silhouette, this lace-up shoe also mirrors its taller counterpart with re-enforced toe caps, supportive padded collars, and signature rubber waffle outsoles. Vans’ legendary Sk8-Hi aesthetic in a low top shoe Durable leather uppers Lace-up closure Re-enforced toe caps Supportive padded collars Signature rubber waffle outsoles

name: Michael Feburary SK8-Hi
description: MICHAEL FEBRUARY SK8-HI 138 DECON SF SCHUHE

name: SMASH SUEDE SNEAKERS
description: Looking for an all-time tennis classic to wear every day? You've just found one. The PUMA Smash Suede is a tennis-inspired shoe that will keep you looking sporty and fresh. With the PUMA Formstrip, a soft full-suede upper and the classic tennis look, this trainer goes well with any style, any time.

name: SMASH LEATHER SNEAKERS
description: PUMA unleashed a full court fury with our 1970s tennis collection. All white leather, all love, these styles were fresh takes on classic court shoes; as good for hours of punishing play as they were for the clubhouse cookout that followed. This version of the Smash stays true to its tennis roots while boasting a stylish new look with an all-leather upper.

name: CLUB NYLON UNISEX SNEAKERS
description: PUMA's newest design, the Club Nylon, was born on the football pitch. With a durable nylon upper, stylish leather-look lining and a full rubber sole for optimum grip, it even features a SoftFoam+ sockliner for enhanced comfort. Infuse your look with some PUMA football DNA.
